body_text:
I don't think you need the || false, since loading is tested for truthiness later and doesn't necessarily need to be a bool.
Beyond that, I'd expect areAnyRequests to return false so we don't need to || false, but I haven't looked at that code yet.
body:
I don't think you need the `|| false`, since `loading` is tested for truthiness later and doesn't necessarily need to be a bool.

Beyond that, I'd expect `areAnyRequests` to return false so we don't need to `|| false`, ~but I haven't looked at that code yet.~
body_html:
I don't think you need the || false, since loading is tested for truthiness later and doesn't necessarily need to be a bool.

Beyond that, I'd expect areAnyRequests to return false so we don't need to || false, but I haven't looked at that code yet.
